name: BIRBO INC.
description:
As a CEO of BIRBO INC., the leading plushie-making company, you are put to the test to make  as much money as possible. Stay as the greenest company that have been operating on our beloved planet ever!
How will you achieve this? Who cares! 

Make decisions and keep your company afloat! Make your consumers happy and Mother Nature happy,

or else...

Credits:

  • MatyjB - programming
